1.label: Alarm cancellation delay
1.description: Time in seconds that the flood state is retained after flooding event

2.label: Select alarm type (visual/acoustic)
2.description: This parameter allows for deactivation visual and acoustic alarm.

options.label: Acoustic alarm inactive, visual alarm active
Acoustic alarm active, visual alarm inactive

7.label: Requested dimming level to 2nd assoc. group
7.description: “On” level to be sent to devices from 2nd association group on flood event

9.label: Device off and alarm cancellations
9.description: Enable/disable device off/alarm cancellation updates to 2nd/3rd assoc groups

10.label: Temperature measurement interval
10.description: Seconds between consecutive measurements of battery level/temperature

12.label: Temperature measurement hysteresis
12.description: Minimum change in temperature value for report to be sent to controller

50.label: Low temperature alarm threshold
50.description: Temperature value below which visual indicator blinks

51.label: High temperature alarm threshold
51.description: Temperature value above which visual indicator blinks

63.label: Visual temperature indicator
63.description: Enable or disable visual temperature indicator via device's LED

73.label: Temperature measurement compensation
73.description: Offset to current temperature to account temperature difference

74.label: Alarm frame for movement/tamper
74.description: Movement/tamper alarm sent to 1st & 4th assoc. group

options.label: Button and movement tampers alarm active

75.label: Alarms signalization duration
75.description: Turn off alarm after given timeout

76.label: Alarm signalization reactivation period
76.description: Time period after which an alarm will be turned back on

77.label: Flood sensor functionality turned off
77.description: Allows the internal flood sensor to be turned off.

78.label: Associations in Z-Wave network security mode
78.description: Defines whether commands are sent as secure or non-secure

options.label: None of the groups are sent as secure
